definition: to expose (e.g., wrongdoing)/to accuse (in court)/to impeach/to denounce
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: In addition, students will be held personally responsible for confronting and reporting any violations that would come to your attention.
sentences.chinese: 此外，学生个人也有责任将所遇之违规事项举发出来。

sentences.english: I'm going to report your tardiness.
After the tourists discovered the man, they reported him to the Beijing Palace Museum.
sentences.chinese: 游客发现之后立即向北京故宫举发。

definition: to expose/to bring to light/to disclose/revelation
to report (an offense to the authorities)/to inform against sb
to bring to justice/to punish according to the law
to frame/to bring false charges against
to neglect one's duty/dereliction of duty
to accuse of misconduct (in official task)/to impeach
to punish (someone)/to take disciplinary action against (someone)
